name: dbase_get_record_with_names
purpose: Gets a record from a database as an associative array

return.description:
An associative array with the record. This will also include a key named 
   deleted which is set to 1 if the record has been marked
   for deletion (see dbase_delete_record).Each field is converted to the appropriate PHP type, except:
   
    
     
      Dates are left as strings.
     
    
    
     
      Integers that would have caused an overflow (> 32 bits)
      are returned as strings.On error, dbase_get_record_with_names will return FALSE.
